title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 261.51 - Warning tag procedures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 261.51 - Warning tag procedures

State Regulations
(a) Each
operator shall file and maintain warning tag procedures with the Gas Division
of the New York State Department of Public Service. (b) The procedures shall include but not be
limited to the requirements of this Part and be designed to make customers
aware of hazardous conditions relating to their gas appliances and piping
installations. (c) The procedures
shall specify categories of employees who will be deemed to possess the
training, knowledge and experience necessary to recognize hazardous conditions
that warrant the issuance of a warning tag. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
261.51

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
